vernu/textbee

open source SMS gateway with API and web dashboard

View on index

Related repos

  • Controls IoT devices via SMS without internet
  • AI chat app for web and desktop, open source
  • Android app for forwarding SMS, calls and notifications to other devices
  • minimal LLM chat app runs in your browser, supports Ollama and OpenAI, multi-server, text and vision models
  • Production-ready text-to-speech API with multiple voices and a real-time dashboard
  • Voice agent using open source models via Twilio
  • Voice chat using WebGPU in a browser
  • offline speech-to-text API for many languages, runs on lots of devices and platforms
